title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: September 12, 2022, 06:22:30 PMLast edit: September 27, 2022, 11:01:13 PM by Hhampuz
content: Fairspin.io have been around the block for a while now and kept innovating and improving on their product. In order to raise awareness throughout bitcointalk and build a community here we are launching this Signature Campaign and if you are a quality poster in the gambling sections we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the gambling boards each week in order to receive a payment, these 10 will count towards the 20 post weekly requirement.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member on bitcointalk.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member you may be removed from the campaign without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread as well as on boards where your signature is not displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.A maximum of 5 posts per week form local boards will be counted towards the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this Campaign.Do not enroll your main and alt account in this campaign or you will be removed and blacklisted from all of my campaigns, forever.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay in this campaign or you will be removed without payment or notice.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Wednesday.Each week will run from Wednesdays > Tuesdays with the cut-off taking place each Tuesday at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This campaign will be open for Sr. Members, Hero Member and Legendary Members.Fairspin reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this campaign at their discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:8x Sr. Members - $55 in BTC/Week.8x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC/Week.The Signatures:Sr.
